channel.title: Shops [Plz help here]
channel.description:
Here: 1. How can i add stuff to shop? (tell me exactly how to do it, im noob) 2. How to price it? 3. How can i change buy 10 to buy 50?
Thanks all guys!!! ;)

item.title: Shops [Plz help here]
item.dc:creator: @reapagescapeftw1 reapagescapeftw
item.description:
@reapagescapeftw1 wrote:

Here Use This And You Can Edit It Heres The Batch File:P

@echo off Echo Npc Id? set /p NpcId=Option: If not Exist ShopMakerFolder MD ShopMaker Folder Echo [Add under the '}' after 'WanneShop = 2;' in client.java] >> ".\ShopMaker\Shopmaker Code.txt" Echo else if (NPCID == %NpcID%) { >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt" Echo PutNPCCords = true; { >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt" Echo WanneShop = 30; >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt" goto menu2 :menu2 set /p ShopId=Shops Id: pause goto menu3 :menu3 cls set /p ItemId=Item Id In Your Shop: pause goto menu4 :menu4 cls set /p Cost=How Many of Thoses Should Be In The Shop: Echo [Add in shops.cfg] { >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt" Echo %ShopId% 1 1 %ItemId% %Cost%{ >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt" pause goto menu5 :menu5 cls Echo [Add in autospawn.cfg] { >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt" set /p cords=Cords X: pause goto menu6 :menu6 set /p coords=Cords Y: pause goto menu7 :menu7 Echo %NpcId% %cords% %coords% 0 0 0 0 1} >> ".\ShopMaker\ShopMaker Code.txt" goto finished :finished echo finished. pause goto menu
And Basicly Enter Your Stuff And In The Shop Maker Code After Remove The 1} Just Leave 1 Remove } And Goto Your Shops And Change This Basicly This Is A Fishing Shop That I Use For My Server But I Changed The Name Of The Shop

shop = ID	My Own Shop			1	1	6570	1

Add That And Ive Edited It To A Example To Your Needs Now 6570 Is The Object Id In The Shop 6570 = Fire Cape Just A Example And The 1 Is The Ammount Of The Item If You Put It 100 For A Example You Will Have 100 Firecapes In Stock! Change The Text After shop = ID To Your Needs Becus I Dint Know What You Would Realy Want So Any Problems? Pm Me Thanks
And If You Want Just The Shop = ID Your Test Thing With Items In It Feel Free To Pm Me And Il Do It For You

Read full topic

item.title: Shops [Plz help here]
item.dc:creator: @imantai imantai
item.description:
@imantai wrote:

Ok so go into Client.java serch for wanneshop = 2

Then add

this under wanneshop = 2

else if (NPCID == 2647) { PutNPCCords = true; WanneShop = 30; }

Then open shops.cfg

Add this into it

30 RARES!!!! 1 1 0773 210000000000 2662 50000000 1041 10000000000 1049 100000000 1039 300000000 2422 500000000
Finaly open autospawn.cfg and put
2647 3209 3430 0 0 0 0 0 1 RARES!!!!!!!!!!!

If you dont understand add my msn joe_dilkes@hotmail.com

Read full topic

WanneShop = 30;
}

[Add in shops.cfg]
30 RARES!!! 1 1 0773 210000000000 2662 50000000 1041 10000000000 1049 100000000 1039 300000000 2422 500000000

[Add in autospawn.cfg]
2647 3209 3430 0 0 0 0 0 1 RARES!!!

Thats my code, where i put? tell me exatcly, im so fucking noob!

item.title: Shops [Plz help here]
item.dc:creator: @jester01445 jester01445
item.description:
@jester01445 wrote:

that happened to me to but it looked like this

[code][Add under the ‘}’ after ‘WanneShop = 2;’ in client.java]
else if (NPCID == 520) {
PutNPCCords = true;
WanneShop = 30;
}

[Add in shops.cfg]
30 Noob_Shop 1 1 1377 1000

[Add in autospawn.cfg]
520 3311 3312 0 0 0 0 0 1[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Shops [Plz help here]

item.description:
@Lateteze wrote:

Now i cant go into my serv!!! I added this to my shop.cfg:30 Owners_shop!!! 1 1 0946 1 0963 100000000
and this to my autospawner:520 2911 9809 0 0 0 0 0 1 Owners_shop!
I made shop with my shopmaker, the code sais like this: [Add under the ‘}’ after ‘WanneShop = 2;’ in client.java]
else if (NPCID == 520) {
PutNPCCords = true;
WanneShop = 30;
}

[Add in shops.cfg]
30 Owners_shop!!! 1 1 0946 1 0963 100000000

[Add in autospawn.cfg]
520 2911 9809 0 0 0 0 0 1 Owners_
What do i have to do?
